direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: A confused Sheldon bends over to pick up a chunk of the Smoochy head. Nora, who's entered at the opposite end of the rink, tries to reach him, but it's impossible. Panicked audience members run across the rink, heading for the exits. It's chaos. People slip, Rhinettes get trampled. CATWALK Randolph tries to get the rifle away from Buggy. They struggle on a narrow beam high above the rink. The cops have reached the outer edge of the catwalk now. Tommy and the boys get there a second later. They all stand back -- the catwalk is too unstable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me that gun, you fucking wacked-out freak! Buggy manages to shove Randolph off him. He raises the RIFLE and SHOOTS at the cops. Randolph grabs him. Both he and Buggy lose their footing and slip from the catwalk. Randolph is able to grab onto the edge and hold on. Buggy clutches Randolph's leg which threatens to bring them both down. They dangle 80 feet above the rink. Randolph desperately tries to hold onto the catwalk as Buggy clings to Randolph's ankle. CLOSE ON RANDOLPH'S FINGERS His knuckles turn white as his fingers start to slip from the beam. ANGLE ON BUGGY Still clutching Randolph's ankle, he starts to lose his grip. He desperately grabs Randolph's foot, but Randolph's shoe slips off and Buggy begins his long plunge to the next life. INT. RINK - HIGH OVERHEAD SHOT Buggy screams the whole way down, still holding onto Randolph's shoe. RINK Buggy crashes into the middle of the rink, cob-webbing the ice around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CATWALK Tommy and his boys runs off to find Sheldon. The COPS help Randolph off the catwalk. He's a nervous wreck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #1 You okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. I'm kind of fucked up in general, so it's hard to gauge. They pat the dazed Randolph on the back.   He passes out. RINK People continue to run through the rink. Felled Rhinettes litter the ice like broken dolls. Smoke fills the air. Sheldon is helping a random woman to her feet as Nora finally reaches him. She embraces him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Burke's with Stokes.   He's been in it all along. Sheldon looks toward the network box. Beyond it, through the smoke, he sees Burke shoving his way through people who jam the exit trying to escape. Sheldon reaches into his costume and pulls out his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Sheldon, don't! Sheldon runs off leaving Nora. EXIT Burke is almost through the cluster of people. He glances over his shoulder and sees Sheldon heading toward him. He shoves even harder now and finally gets through. EXT. MADISON SQUARE GARDEN - CONTINUOUS ACTION Burke makes a run for it down 33rd Street. A moment later, Sheldon emerges from the building. He sees Burke in the distance and takes off after him. He's still in his skates and wearing the partially-blown-off Smoochy head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FURTHER DOWN STREET Burke looks behind and sees the nightmarish image of a disfigured Smoochy chasing after him. He quickly rounds the corner. EXT. STREET A few moments later Sheldon rounds the corner. He looks down the street and sees no sign of Burke. He notices an alley by an abandoned building. EXT. ALLEY - CONTINUOUS ACTION Sheldon walks slowly into the alley, gun drawn. Suddenly, Burke jumps out from behind some boxes. He whacks Sheldon's head with a garbage can lid. The gun goes flying. Burke goes for it, but Sheldon is quickly on his feet and pounces on him. The two men fight it out. Burke manages to get on top of Sheldon and starts to strangle him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You fucking point a gun at me? A gun I gave you as a gift?! Where's your fucking etiquette? Just as Sheldon begins to lose consciousness, we hear a GUNSHOT. Burke looks up. Nora stands there, pointing Sheldon's gun directly at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let him go. Burke just looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now. Before I pump one in that Grecian Formula scalp of yours. Burke smirks as he releases Sheldon. Sheldon jumps up and takes the gun from Nora. He shakily points it at Burke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know something, kid? You've turned out to be an incredible pain in the ass. Burke slowly stands up, brushing off his suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were behind the Spinner hit, weren't you? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was a tragic mistake. (shakes head sadly) If only one could turn back time... (beat) But what the hell, it's just one less mick in the world. He laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You son-of-a-bitch. Sheldon cocks the gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my. What are you gonna do? Kill me? That wouldn't be very Smoochy-like behavior.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right. There's just one thing... Sheldon tears off the remains of his tattered costume and steps out of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not Smoochy. Sheldon is shaking as he extends the gun to Burke's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I finally realized we're living in a different jungle. Burke suddenly looks fearful, as does Nora.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Sheldon. Sheldon closes his eyes as he tries to summon up the courage to pull the trigger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sheldon! Suddenly, there's a voice from behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't do it, Shel. Sheldon turns around.       It's Tommy and her boys. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sternly) Stay out of it, Tommy.   This is my business. Tommy walks closer to Sheldon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No more killin', Shel. Enough's enough. Don't destroy who you are for this piece of shit. You mean something to the kids. Don't take Smoochy away from the kids. Tommy extends her hand for the gun. Sheldon looks down at the gun. He can't believe he's even holding it. He hands it to Tommy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know how I got pushed this far.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're only human, Shel. The important thing is... you never went over the cliff. You're a good boy. For some of us... it's too late. Tommy pats Sheldon's shoulder affectionately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll take it from here, kid, you run along with your girl. Get on with your life. Sheldon looks over at Burke, who's petrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tommy, you're not going to -- TOMMY Don't worry. Sometimes even a rat deserves a little mercy. Sheldon and Nora take a final look at Burke before walking out of the alley. Burke is wide-eyed with fear as Tommy's boys advance on him. Just as they round the corner there is the sound of TWO GUNSHOTS. Sheldon looks at Nora.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bus backfire. She pats him on the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. MADISON SQUARE GARDEN - CONTINUOUS ACTION Stokes finally makes it out of the arena. He runs toward his waiting limo and hops in the back seat. He barks to his driver through the glass partition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get out of here! The car doesn't move.   Stokes pounds on the partition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move this thing! No response. Stokes frantically pushes the button that lowers the partition. It slides down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you deaf?! I said -- The driver turns around. Stokes recoils in horror. It's Takashi. He smiles as the back doors open and the Japanese thugs -- Chick, Sambo and Tobi -- pile in with Stokes. They slam the doors shut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish I could tell you it'll be quick and painless, Frank, but you know how these things go... Stokes lets out a small whimper. Chick nods to Takashi who steps on the gas as he sings "Anything Goes" in Japanese. EXT. TH AVENUE - CONTINUOUS ACTION The car heads into the night, passing Sheldon and Nora, who have exited the alley. This will be Frank Stokes' final limo ride. EXT. STREET - CONTINUOUS ACTION Sheldon and Nora pause on the street.    Sheldon looks around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, a little grime here and there doesn't change the fact... it's still a beautiful city. He looks at Nora. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go home, Smoochy.    Show's over. Sheldon gazes back at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No it's not. It's just beginning. They kiss passionately as MUSIC SWELLS and the CAMERA CRANES HIGH ABOVE the rink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And now... it gives us great pleasure to introduce America's favorite rhino... ladies and gentlemen... boys and girls... There's a dramatic pause; TYMPANY ROLL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heeeeeere's Smoochy! Smoochy skates out to thunderous applause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With his partner and comrade... the one, the only... Rainbow Randolph! Randolph skates out, somewhat shakily, to huge applause. Sheldon puts his arm around him. The audience is now on their feet. Randolph especially basks in the adulation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All proceeds from tonight's performance, will benefit the Rainbow Randolph Center for Alcoholism and Delusional Behavior. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: TO: FLASHBACK - INT. BOXING RING(S) - SOMETIME IN THE PAST Through a SERIES OF CUTS we see Spinner getting pummeled in various fights. (CONTINUED)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: TO: INT. SPINNER DUNN'S RESTAURANT (PRESENT) Spinner is still pumping Sheldon's hand.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: TO: INT. SHELDON'S OFFICE - SHORT WHILE LATER Sheldon is in a meeting with a man, SONNY GORDON.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: SONNY GORDON, PRESIDENT, ANIMAL WRANGLERS' LOCAL 358 SONNY
HEADLINE "GARDEN TO HOST SMOOCHY ON ICE
GATE EXPECTED -- VENDORS SALIVATE AT SMELL OF BIG BUCKS
TIGHT ON FACE OF FRANK STOKES
TIGHT ON DISAPPOINTED FACE OF SPINNER DUNN

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. SAME STREET - HOURS LATER In the same frame, detectives and uniformed cops are now at the scene gathering evidence. Where Spinner once lay, there is now a bright yellow chalk outline in the shape of a rhinoceros. INT. PARADE OF HOPE OFFICES - NEXT DAY FULL FRAME ON a TELEVISION screen.    A local news anchor is reading the top story.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: SEEN OUTSIDE BUILDING SHORTLY BEFORE SHOOTING, DRENCHED IN GASOLINE AND ACTING PECULIAR

dialogue.raw_text: . FADE UP ON: INT. MADISON SQUARE GARDEN - ONE YEAR LATER SUPERIMPOSE:    ONE YEAR LATER The Garden is sold out.    The lights go down.    Through the P.A. we hear...
dialogue.name: dialogue
